column4: which were all of melt-in-your-mouth buttery quality. I normally prefer salmon
column5: but Kata may have won me over with their tuna. Nice hot sake to top it off. The caribbean roll was delicious. The california roll was just so-so. We ended with a mouth-watering uni special entree
column6: but I forgot what it was called. Overall - good service
column7: presentation and ambiance. $100 out the door for 3 during happy hour. All I can say is: you get what you pay for :)
